wikipedia_page.main:
Karen Tite is an English actress based in Newcastle upon Tyne
She was formerly a member of the now-disbanded Purple Monkey Theatre Company, and was involved with the Valley Theatre Company also based in Scarborough.

response: Before Britain's Got Talent, Pratt appeared at BBC Radio York's stand-up comedy event, More Front Than Scarborough, on 11 March 2007. He impressed the judges with his jokes, coming in at second place to Karen Tite.
